title: The Heartbreaker Next Door
description: Cue pizza and winetheatre tickets andone last chance at love with the heartbreaker next door.He's determined to win the girl...Eric Zhou has spent years hiding his true feelings for the girl next door.Why wouldn’t he?He was twelve the first time Em rejected him and thirty the last.But no matter how often she breaks his heart, Eric keeps coming back for more.Thanks to fate and meddling moms, Eric finds himself Em’s new roommate.This is his chance to convince Emily Han he’s more than the guy next door.She wants the one man she can never have...Emily Han has been in love with Eric most of her life.Afraid of rejection and abandonment, she keeps her feelings bottled inside while watching Eric break the hearts of women around the globe.In an apartment with only one bed, Em will have to decide whether or not to tell Eric the truth: she wants to be more than friends.It’s now or never.
author: Rachel A. Smith
